DESCRIPTION.P: This block displays the value of its unique input inside the block (in the diagram) during simulation. The block must be located in the main Scicos window.
Warning: each time the block is moved user must click on it to set its parameters. The display position is then automatically updated.

ITEM.label: font
ITEM.SP: : integer, the selected font number (see xset)

ITEM.label: fontsize
ITEM.SP: : integer, the selected font size (set xset)

ITEM.label: color
ITEM.SP: : integer, the selected color for the text (see xset)

ITEM.label: Total numer of digits
ITEM.SP: : an integer greater than 3, the maximum number of digits used to represent the number (sign, integer part and rational part)

ITEM.label: rational part number of digits
ITEM.SP: : an integer greater than or equal 0, the number of digits used to represent the rational part
